message.content:
To identify the value of expense relevant to the statement of profit or loss and other comprehensive income from the given balance sheet data, the key line item to consider would be **Accumulated Depreciation**.

- Depreciation expense is the typical recognized expense in the profit or loss statement related to fixed assets.
- Initial value of Accumulated Depreciation is 0.00 (2023-12-31).
- End value of Accumulated Depreciation is 117540.62 (2024-02-03).

No other explicit expense line is present in this balance sheet extract. Retained Earnings increase likely reflect net income net of expenses but do not specify individual expense amounts.

Thus, the expense related line item value extracted is the **Accumulated Depreciation**, with initial and final values shown above.
